messages.subject: article about last years conference
messages.msgSnippet: This is for anyone that attended the unschooling conference in SC last year. I am trying to write an article about it and would like to include some memories
messages.messageBody:
This is for anyone that attended the unschooling conference in SC last year.
I am trying to write an article about it and would like to include some
memories of other attendees, not just my own.
If you don't mind emailing me a favorite memory of the conference, something
funny, or poignant or life changing...whatever really moved you or made a
difference in your life.
Thanks!!

Ren, starsuncloud@...
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
